content: inspired by the delicate color of cherry blossom that is found in her garden s flowers andrea yetman s new sock pattern is showing little budding flowers and travelling leaves ======================================== to keep all the attention on this beautiful lace design the toe and heel are kept very simple topped off with a blended feminine cuff yarn ---------------------------------------- in addition to the pattern you will need the following to knit these socks **yarn** biscotte yarns bis-sock shown in fleur de cerisier colour 100g **notions** 2 5mm dpn s / circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle stitch marker s **gauge** | 18 sts across and 24 sts down= 2 inches measured on stockinette stitch before blocking **sizes** | small / medium large / xlarge la version française de ce patron se trouve sur leslainesbiscotte com 1 1 https //leslainesbiscotte com/products/her-gardens-flowers-patron-de-tricot
